note.p: Mining engineer. Experienced in iron-ore mining in north-east England. Fellow of the Geological Society of London, 1874. Member of the North of England Institute of Mining and Mechanical Engineers, 1874. Manager of Salter Hall Mining Company, Cumberland, 1879. Resigned as manager of Postlethwaite’s Moor Row mines, Cumberland, to open an office in London, in 1896.
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/5173/76/12)
Proceedings of the Geological Society of London 1874–5 p. xii
Transactions of the North of England Institute of Mining Engineers (1874–5)
